price: by which the angels and the Spirit[2] will ascend to Him on a Day[3] the length of which is fifty thousand years.
arabic: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ
footnotes:
[2] i.e., the angel Gabriel.
 [3] The Day of Judgment will be an extremely long day.
